Mueller’s report showed no evidence of collusion, nor did it establish that @POTUS engaged in obstruction of justice.  After 2 years of partisan attacks in the form of dangerous speculation, it‘s time to move forward & focus on real issues like lowering prescription drug costs.

Attorney General Barr has said that he will provide as much transparency as he can that is consistent with the law, which I support because Americans deserve as much openness as possible regarding this important report.
The Special Counsel has finally completed its investigation and Attorney General Barr and the Department of Justice are reviewing this report.

Today I’m proposing 3 solutions to rising Rx drug prices:
▪️ Shine a light on price negotiations
▪️ Clear the way for more drug approvals by FDA
▪️ Provide oversight & accountability for drug makers
